Package ui.game.menu.playerConfigs

Interface OnlinePlayerConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientPlayerConfig, ServerPlayerConfig
    public interface OnlinePlayerConfig
    Helper interface for getting the appropriate type of player config for online players. If player 1 then a client player config, if player 2 a server player config.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  OnlinePlayerConfig.PortBox
      A text box for entering the port to use.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static short DEFAULT_PORT  

    • Method Summary

      Static Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static PlayerConfig getInstance​(TerminalHandler terminalHandler, boolean enabled, boolean player2)
      Gets the appropriate online player config.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_PORT

        static final short DEFAULT_PORT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        static PlayerConfig getInstance​(TerminalHandler terminalHandler,
                                boolean enabled,
                                boolean player2)
        Gets the appropriate online player config.
        Parameters:
        terminalHandler - The TerminalHandler.
        enabled - If the config menu is enabled for selection.
        player2 - Boolean; true if config menu belongs to player 2.
        Returns:
        The server/client player config instance.
